title: Gathering Magical Power
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Kukuku.... Little Demon Lili, Yohane shall have you aid me in my ritual today....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ritual?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>The moon’s power is weakening.... Now is the time to unleash all the magical power in the world!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, so that’s what you mean. Hmm, I’ll accompany you as long as it’s not too late at night.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Geez! It’s nothing trivial like that, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ahaha, sorry, sorry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It won’t be that late, Yohane just wants you to wear the same outfit as me and chant a spell together with me, Riko....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, sure. I’ll go along with your ritual, I promised after all, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>! Yeah! It’s only natural for you as my little demon, Lili! Now then, let’s practice chanting the spell!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I hope it’s not too hard....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
